definition: Wanhua district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for China
magnificent/splendid/flowery
old variant of 花[hua1]/flower
Wanhua district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

sentences.english: With its continuous ideas on technical innovation, Wanhua has been driving the progress in the sector of new chemical materials.
sentences.chinese: 萬華不斷用新的技術創新推動化工新材料行業的進步。

sentences.english: Summer night Yang to call China when she is to pet a bath, he misunderstood.
sentences.chinese: 夏晚陽給萬華打電話時她正給寵物洗澡，他誤解了。

sentences.english: Tang Wanghua was trained to be a great teacher.
sentences.chinese: 唐萬華被培養成爲一名優秀的教師。

sentences.english: Li Duan-duan, Director, Taipei Wanhua Community University.
sentences.chinese: 李端端，主任，臺北市萬華社區大學。

sentences.english: Wanhua is taking the leadership across China's polyurethane industry.
sentences.chinese: 萬華是中國聚氨酯產業的領軍企業。

sentences.english: Do you know how to get to Wanhua Railway Station by train?
sentences.chinese: 您知道要怎麼搭火車到萬華火車站嗎？

sentences.english: Wanhua is the most lively smile of China on the global chemical stage.
sentences.chinese: 萬華，是中國在世界化工舞臺上最生動的一個微笑。
